TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Evidence extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class Evidence Implements ICollection
public ref class Evidence sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type Evidence = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 定义组成对安全策略决策的输入的一组信息。

span.span: Defines the set of information that constitutes input to security policy decisions.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常见形式的证据包括签名和位置的源的代码，但可能可以是任何内容。Common forms of evidence include signatures and location of origin of code, but can potentially be anything. 所识别的安全策略的任何类型的对象表示的证据。Objects of any type that are recognized by security policy represent evidence. 安全策略组成代码组;如果它满足代码组的成员资格条件，则特定程序集 （要为其授予安全权限的基本单位） 是代码的代码组的成员。Security policy is composed of code groups; a particular assembly (the basic unit of code for granting security permissions) is a member of a code group if it satisfies the code group's membership condition. 证据是输入到成员资格条件使用它来确定对哪些代码组所属的程序集的策略集。Evidence is the set of inputs to policy that membership conditions use to determine to which code groups an assembly belongs. 类是一个集合 (请参阅) 包含一组表示证据的对象。The class is a collection (see ) that holds a set of objects that represent evidence. 此类包含对应的两个集的证据源： 承载和程序集的证据。This class holds two sets that correspond to the source of the evidence: host evidence and assembly evidence. 评估代码的权限时，策略可以从两个不同的源获取证据。Policy can get evidence from two different sources when evaluating permissions for code. - `Host evidence` 由主机，并且只能由已被授予的主机提供权限。`Host evidence` is provided by the host, and can only be provided by hosts that have been granted the permission. 通常，这是代码和程序集上的数字签名的原点的证据。Typically, this is evidence of the origin of the code and digital signatures on the assembly. 有关源的证据通常包括， ，和证据。Evidence about origin typically includes , , and evidence. 签名是指软件发布者 （AuthentiCode X.509v3 签名） 和强名称标识。Signatures refer to software publisher (AuthentiCode X.509v3 signature) and strong name identities. 这两种数字签名基于标识的内置于程序集，但必须被验证并由主机; 传递到策略加载时，安全系统将验证签名。Both kinds of digital signature-based identity are built into the assembly, but must be validated and passed to policy by the host; when loaded, the security system verifies the signature. 然后，系统创建适当的证据，并将其传递到策略中，仅当相应签名有效。The system then creates the appropriate evidence and passes it to policy only if the corresponding signature is valid. - `Assembly evidence` 是在程序集本身的一部分。`Assembly evidence` is part of the assembly itself. 开发人员或管理员可以附加到要扩展的策略的证据集的程序集的自定义的证据。Developers or administrators can attach custom evidence to the assembly to extend the set of evidence for policy. 只能在程序集签名之前发生的程序集生成时添加程序集的证据。Assembly evidence can only be added at the time of assembly generation, which occurs before the assembly is signed. 安全系统的默认策略忽略程序集提供的证据，但可以扩展策略来接受它。The default policy of the security system ignores assembly-provided evidence, but policy can be extended to accept it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建新使用这两类主机证据和程序集的证据。The following code example demonstrates how to create new classes with both host evidence and assembly evidence. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CPP/evidence_evidence.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/CS/evidence_evidence.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Evidence#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Evidence/VB/evidence_evidence.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的程序集证据添加到证据集。

span.span: Adds the specified assembly evidence to the evidence set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法为派生自程序集的证据。Use this method for evidence derived from the assembly. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不执行检查，以防止添加重复的类型的证据。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 在同一时间可以存在多个程序集的证据对象。Many assembly evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Merge(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

param.name: evidence
param.span: 要合并到当前证据集的证据集。

span.span: The evidence set to be merged into the current evidence set.

summary.span: 将指定的证据集合并到当前证据集。

span.span: Merges the specified evidence set into the current evidence set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据它所来自的集情况下，在指定的证据集中每个证据对象添加到当前的证据集，程序集和主机组。Each evidence object in the specified evidence set is added to the assembly and host sets of the current evidence set, according to the sets from which it came. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不执行检查，以防止添加重复的类型的证据。This method does not perform a check to prevent adding duplicate types of evidence. 在同一时间可以存在多个程序集和主机证据对象。Many assembly and host evidence objects can exist at the same time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
